name: Russian Highway Traffic Racing
description:
Russia it's not only vodka, balalaika and brown bears, but also extremely speed driving! Welcome to Russian Highway Traffic Racing - you'd better buckle the seat belt!

HOW TO PLAY: Rotate your device like a real steering wheel and drive your car. Use gas pedal and brakes to control your speed. Don't crash into your opponents unless you want to lose!

Russian Highway Traffic Racing game features:
Variety of russian cars - try driving VAZ, UAZ and other;
Different tracks - can you survive russian winter?
Enjoy accelerometer control - feel like a real driver.

Russian Highway Traffic Racing - open the door to the world of crazy tracks and high speed!
